headline: Why Gartner Stock Plummeted 30.3% This Week
summary: Gartner's slowing contract growth sent the stock plunging this week.

headline: Gartner Hype Cycle Identifies Top AI Innovations in 2025
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., August 08, 2025--AI agents and AI-ready data are the two fastest advancing technologies on the 2025 Gartner Hype Cycle for Artificial Intelligence.

headline: By 2028, 1 in 4 candidate profiles will be fake, Gartner predicts
summary: “It’s getting harder for employers to evaluate candidates’ true abilities, and in some cases, their identities,” a senior research director at Gartner said.
